name: bob-project
short_description:
Bob is a system management / configuration tool. It can be used as disaster recovery, and had been designed to support multiple sites / environments with thousands of servers. Bob is secure, quick, and simple.

Managing IT infrastructure should not be a chore. Recent system management tools have been built around using cfengine or ruby. Why should a system administrator have to be a developer? Why do they need to learn a new language? Operating systems have already solved this problem, it's called file system. In UNIX everything is a file. If you can use an editor, you already know bob.

Yes, it is that simple.

Why bob? Because it's Bob The Builder - yes we can!
summary: Quick, simple, intuitive, powerul UNIX system management solution.
